overview: Ana is a mute woman living in a remote mountain area with father, Badong. Badong is sick and is searching for a man that will marry his daughter. He finds Michael, a man who expresses interest to wed Anna, because of the land he could inherit from her father. In the absence of her traveling husband, Ah meets Mayang, with whom she forms a great friendship. Soon, Ana discovers that Mayang is also married to Michael.
title: Sidhi
